          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A fogazat és a fogápolás</string>
            <string language="en-US">Teeth And Tooth Care</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zähne Und Zahn-Obacht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dents et Soin de Dent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dentes E Cuidado Do Dente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Denti E Cura Del Dente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δόντια και προσοχή δοντιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dientes Y Cuidado Del Diente</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A fogak szerkezete; a tejfogak és a maradó fogazat; a fogazat megbetegedései (fogszuvasodás, fogbélgyulladás, ínygyulladás); a fogápolás; a fogorvosi kezelések</string>
            <string language="en-US">Structure of Teeth; Milk Teeth and Permanent Teeth; Tooth Diseases (Dental Caries, Pulp Inflammation, Gum Inflammation); Tooth Care; Dental Treatments</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">egészséges életmódra nevelés</string>
            <string language="en-US">healhty lifestyle education</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">testápolás</string>
            <string language="en-US">body care</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">fogazat</string>
            <string language="en-US">teeth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">bőr</string>
            <string language="en-US">skin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">haj</string>
            <string language="en-US">hair</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">köröm</string>
            <string language="en-US">fingernail</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Struktur der Zähne; Milch-Zähne und 
permanente Zähne; Zahn-Krankheiten (Zahnmedizinische Karies, 
Masse Entzündung, Gummi-Entzündung); Zahn-Obacht; 
Zahnmedizinische Behandlungen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Structure des dents ; Dents de lait et 
dents permanentes ; Les Maladies de Dent (Carie, Inflammation De
Pulpe, Inflammation Dentaires de Gomme) ; Soin de Dent ; 
Traitements Dentaires</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estrutura dos dentes; Dentes do leite e 
dentes permanentes; Doenças Do Dente (Cárie, Inflammation Da 
Polpa, Inflammation Dentais Do Gum); Cuidado Do Dente; 
Tratamentos Dentais</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Struttura dei denti; Denti del latte e 
denti permanente; Malattie Del Dente (Carie, Infiammazione Della
Polpa, Infiammazione Dentali Della Gomma); Cura Del Dente; 
Trattamenti Dentali</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δομή των δοντιών  Δόντια γάλακτος και μόνιμα 
δόντια  Ασθένειες δοντιών (οδοντική τερηδόνα, ανάφλεξη 
πολτού, ανάφλεξη γόμμας)  Προσοχή δοντιών  Οδοντικές
επεξεργασίες</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estructura de dientes; Dientes de la leche 
y dientes permanentes; Enfermedades Del Diente (Carie, 
Inflamación De la Pulpa, Inflamación Dentales De la Goma); 
Cuidado Del Diente; Tratamientos Dentales</string>
          </description>
